intro: Arachniodes ziyunshanensis, commonly known as the Ziyunshan shield fern, is a rare and endemic species found in the mountainous regions of China. It belongs to the family Davalliaceae and is characterized by its unique, shield-shaped fronds that are often covered in a dense layer of fine, silky hairs. The plant thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically on rocky slopes or in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species facing threats from habitat loss and climate change.
